title: Volgastallion
author: Volgastallion
content: GEOLOCALIZATION OF IMAGESIm going to star to offer my services in this, i think im really good making this, but i know a lot of times the place can be unfindable.How i work or i do this?Nothing works better than an example. Here its how i found this pic of filiponeQuote from: Volgastallion on February 15, 2023, 12:59:38 AMQuote from: Volgastallion on February 15, 2023, 12:38:53 AMQuote from: fillippone on February 14, 2023, 11:34:43 PMQuote from: fillippone on January 01, 2022, 12:15:43 PMHappy New year!First WO contest of 2022!Where am I?More precision=> more merits.Today I was on the same slope again, and thought about the WO gang. Luckily no mask this year! I think you are in the Val di Fassa, but my geolocation work can be not correct.I think im correct 100% now.https://www.google.com/maps/place/Valle+de+Fassa/@46.4822748,11.803874,333m/data=!3m1!1e3!4m14!1m7!3m6!1s0x47786916a6b026ab:0x1f9739100871cd0e!2sValle+de+Fassa!8m2!3d46.4333333!4d11.7!16s%2Fm%2F0gtt98c!3m5!1s0x47786916a6b026ab:0x1f9739100871cd0e!8m2!3d46.4333333!4d11.7!16s%2Fm%2F0gtt98cI cant post images but here we go with the analisys.If you can see the Cableway if you do zoom its the amrked in the photo, and to the left its that "shelter".EDIT: your photo its taken from this place.https://www.google.com/maps/@46.4784827,11.8125518,3a,71.1y,303.62h,84.86t/data=!3m8!1e1!3m6!1sAF1QipPW-jJ0IsCGlpRHFdm7neElLNYT6CV6lNeYTm73!2e10!3e11!6shttps:%2F%2Flh5.googleusercontent.com%2Fp%2FAF1QipPW-jJ0IsCGlpRHFdm7neElLNYT6CV6lNeYTm73%3Dw203-h100-k-no-pi-0-ya195.58926-ro0-fo100!7i10240!8i5120My price? Really good question.If i cant found the image : NOTHING.If i found "fast" the image $25If its hard to find between $25 and $100.If its really important to you to find something or someplace and you want me to work really hard we can reach an agreement and talk the price.I know im not well know here and i know not so much persons need this "service" but i have good in this so im offering.I only accept works from Trusted accounts in the forum, i cant lose my time with newbies because i dont know if after the work done they are going to pay me.How it works and how you can submit a request.- Post in this thread your image and bring me all the extra info you have. For example in the case of Filipone we all know he is Italian.- If i find the place i will comment here all the detailed info, and if you dont pay i hope some well know DT member will tag you negative.If you have some question let me know in the comments, i made selfmoderate topic to avoid newbies spam.

comments.author: geusswhosbk
comments.body: i would like to use ur servises and keep you around for work heres my email  iwillseeu@protonmail.comthis is a good service you offer i hope we can work with eachother for a long time... can u get location from videos too or just pics..i will be using ur serves quite often

comments.author: Volgastallion
comments.body: Quote from: geusswhosbk on March 02, 2023, 12:24:12 AMi would like to use ur servises and keep you around for work heres my email  iwillseeu@protonmail.comthis is a good service you offer i hope we can work with eachother for a long time... can u get location from videos too or just pics..i will be using ur serves quite often Hi man, thanks for the words! I say in the post im not willing to work with newbies or recently create accounts because i dont know if you can pay me after the work its done.Asides of that only for fun and to make publicity of this bring here and image of what you want and i try to find the place, and yes also videos can be found. Obviusly its not easy in some parts and im not a full profesional in this.

comments.author: Volgastallion
comments.body: Come on guys! I know somebody needs to find something.
